New Records: Paolo Banchero scored 34 points, seven rebounds, three assists, two steals, and one block in his return from injury.
Paolo Banchero shot 11-for-21 from the field and 5-for-8 from three-pointers.
Key Match Events: Paolo Banchero's return from a 34-game absence was a significant event in the game.
The Orlando Magic narrowly lost the game 109-106 to the Milwaukee Bucks.
Post-Match Reflections: Paolo Banchero expressed satisfaction with his performance despite not feeling fully back to his pre-injury form.
Orlando Magic head coach Jamahl Mosley praised Banchero's poise and determination during the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Orlando Magic are now 22-18 in the Eastern Conference following the loss.
Paolo Banchero's return provides a significant boost as the team looks to bounce back in their next matchup.
